page.title: 14Farming
page.content: The local farmer has about 200 acres of pasture land.On it he rears{cattle; Fresian,,Hereford crosses,Charolais crosses,Simmental crosses and Angus crosses.His approximate number of stock is 600. {Buildings}in farming are important because you need barns or buildings for storing barley,wheat,hay,silage and potatoes.There are other barns or buildings for housing cattle they are called cattle courts. The kind of{machinery}farmers use today are mainly tractors to pull necessary implements like ploughs, sprayers to fertilize the crops and to stop beetles and other insects doing damage.There are many more implements that attach onto tractors.Combines cut the corn in the Autumn.
